legal_basis: Rule 222 of the Federal Courts Rules
evidence_assessment: documents a party intends to rely on
documents that adversely affect their case/support another's case
procedure_followed: Novopharm moved for an order requiring Lilly to produce further documents before oral discovery began
decision_reasoning: post-2001 documents relevant but rejected wholesale disclosure requests
result_of_case: Lilly ordered to produce specific additional documents
motion otherwise dismissed with costs in the cause
cause_of_action: Patent infringement claim by Lilly against Novopharm
